**歌詞
（[[ピアプロ>>http://piapro.jp/content/f5b27o63zk23dk70]]より転載）

囁き 先に
少し心を
隠れた足は
まばたきの果て

逆巻きの風
集めた影が
残る そっと響く
向こう側のサイン


wars the sand disappeared in
was the sound in amazing?
as a laughing seeding,
days comes in nothing not to mean proud for you
because you're here now, aren't you?


朝と日々の境を
探し出したのは あなたの色彩の中
重なる 明日とwhite world
i found delays with turning the thin light
answering the ash, you stayed there

i'm standing on this rule



around the lasting season,
the ground with us disabled stings
a thousand lasting bleeding made a plastic quarrel
proudly and guiltily
it's not to form meaning for me


繰り返す音は 砂の波
まだ目指した 過去の 伝えられない言葉と
待ち続けてく white world
these loud delays keep making to breathe in the real


and that thin light did ray them
it's sole free sound in soul
